text: Brembilla may refer to: * Brembilla, a former commune in the province of Bergamo, in Lombardy, Italy ** Val Brembilla, a comune resulting from the 2014 merger of Brembilla and Gerosa * Alberto Brembilla, an Italian basketball player * Emiliano Brembilla, an Italian swimmer * Pierre Brembilla, a French association football player in the 1930s and 1940s ==See also== * Brambilla
title: Brembilla (disambiguation)
